mapper.select:
select a.user_code userCode, a.user_acct userAcct, a.user_password userPassword, a.user_name userName, a.sex sex, a.phone phone, a.email email, a.id_card idCard, a.role role, a.version version from t_sys_user a where a.is_deleted = 0 and a.role = 1
and a.user_acct like concat('%', #{userAcct}, '%')
and a.user_name like concat('%', #{userName}, '%')
order by create_time desc
